trans-unit.source: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Pricing and availability page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.
trans-unit.target: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Pricing and availability page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.

trans-unit.source: Set IAP pricing and availability
trans-unit.target: Set IAP pricing and availability

trans-unit.source: Set IAP pricing and availability
trans-unit.target: Set IAP pricing and availability

trans-unit.source: When submitting an IAP, the options on the **Pricing and availability** page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.
trans-unit.target: When submitting an IAP, the options on the **Pricing and availability** page determine what to charge for your IAP and how it should be offered to customers.

trans-unit.source: Base price
trans-unit.target: Base price

trans-unit.source: You must select a base price for your IAP.
trans-unit.target: You must select a base price for your IAP.

trans-unit.source: These price tiers are the same as the price tiers for apps, starting at .99 USD.
trans-unit.target: These price tiers are the same as the price tiers for apps, starting at .99 USD.

trans-unit.source: You also have the option to offer your IAP for free.
trans-unit.target: You also have the option to offer your IAP for free.

trans-unit.source: Markets and custom prices
trans-unit.target: Markets and custom prices

trans-unit.source: By default, your IAP will be listed in all possible markets, including any future markets that we may add later, at its base price.
trans-unit.target: By default, your IAP will be listed in all possible markets, including any future markets that we may add later, at its base price.

trans-unit.source: However, just as with an app, you have the option to choose the markets in which you'd like to offer your IAP.
trans-unit.target: However, just as with an app, you have the option to choose the markets in which you'd like to offer your IAP.

trans-unit.source: In most cases you'll want to pick the same set of markets as the app, but you have the flexibility to make changes as needed.
trans-unit.target: In most cases you'll want to pick the same set of markets as the app, but you have the flexibility to make changes as needed.

trans-unit.source: You can also set custom prices so that you can charge different prices for the IAP in different markets.
trans-unit.target: You can also set custom prices so that you can charge different prices for the IAP in different markets.

trans-unit.source: For more info and a full list of the available markets, see [Define pricing and market selection](define-pricing-and-market-selection.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info and a full list of the available markets, see [Define pricing and market selection](define-pricing-and-market-selection.md).

trans-unit.source: Sale pricing
trans-unit.target: Sale pricing

trans-unit.source: If you want to offer your IAP at a reduced price for a limited period of time, you can create and schedule a sale.
trans-unit.target: If you want to offer your IAP at a reduced price for a limited period of time, you can create and schedule a sale.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Put apps and IAPs on sale](put-apps-and-iaps-on-sale.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Put apps and IAPs on sale](put-apps-and-iaps-on-sale.md).

trans-unit.source: Distribution and visibility
trans-unit.target: Distribution and visibility

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether your IAP should be offered for purchase to customers.
trans-unit.target: You can determine whether your IAP should be offered for purchase to customers.

trans-unit.source: Choose from one of the following options:
trans-unit.target: Choose from one of the following options:

trans-unit.source: **Available for purchase. May be displayed in your app's listing:** This is the default setting and is recommended unless you want to restrict access to your IAP.
trans-unit.target: **Available for purchase. May be displayed in your app's listing:** This is the default setting and is recommended unless you want to restrict access to your IAP.

trans-unit.source: Leave this option checked for IAPs that will be made available to any customer.
trans-unit.target: Leave this option checked for IAPs that will be made available to any customer.

trans-unit.source: **Available for purchase. Not displayed in your app's listing:** Choosing this option allows customers to purchase the IAP from within your app, but the IAP will not be displayed in your app's Store listing.
trans-unit.target: **Available for purchase. Not displayed in your app's listing:** Choosing this option allows customers to purchase the IAP from within your app, but the IAP will not be displayed in your app's Store listing.

trans-unit.source: Use this only when the offer is not broadly available, for example during initial periods of internal testing.
trans-unit.target: Use this only when the offer is not broadly available, for example during initial periods of internal testing.

trans-unit.source: No longer available for purchase.
trans-unit.target: No longer available for purchase.

trans-unit.source: Not displayed in your app's listing.
trans-unit.target: Not displayed in your app's listing.

trans-unit.source: Choosing this option means that the IAP won't be displayed in your app's listing, and no new customers may purchase the IAP.
trans-unit.target: Choosing this option means that the IAP won't be displayed in your app's listing, and no new customers may purchase the IAP.

trans-unit.source: However, **this option is not supported for customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier**.
trans-unit.target: However, **this option is not supported for customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier**.

trans-unit.source: If your app is available on Windows 8.1 or earlier, the IAP will still be available for purchase to those customers.
trans-unit.target: If your app is available on Windows 8.1 or earlier, the IAP will still be available for purchase to those customers.

trans-unit.source: To stop offering this IAP to customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier, you'll need to update your app to remove the code that offers the IAP, then publish a new submission for the app.
trans-unit.target: To stop offering this IAP to customers on Windows 8.1 or earlier, you'll need to update your app to remove the code that offers the IAP, then publish a new submission for the app.

trans-unit.source: This is recommended even if your app doesn't target Windows 8.1 or earlier; it's a better experience for your customers if you never offer them an IAP that you've opted to make unavailable.
trans-unit.target: This is recommended even if your app doesn't target Windows 8.1 or earlier; it's a better experience for your customers if you never offer them an IAP that you've opted to make unavailable.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Changing this setting and/or submitting an app update that removes the IAP doesn't affect any customers who have already purchased the IAP, regardless of their operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Changing this setting and/or submitting an app update that removes the IAP doesn't affect any customers who have already purchased the IAP, regardless of their operating system.
